item.title: How I moved my website from Wordpress to GitHub Pages
item.description: During my PhD, I created a personal academic website built with Wordpress and hosted by HostGator in order to establish my online presence. I then started blogging here and there about software programs, and eventually R code etc., that I was using or found helpful when conducting evolutionary genetic analyses for my previous or ongoing collaborations.
